keywords.value: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver (TV Program)

lead_paragraph: Mr. Miranda, whose parents are both from Puerto Rico, was on “Last Week Tonight With John Oliver” to seek relief.

headline.print_headline: Miranda Uses Rap in Plea for Puerto Rico
headline.main: Lin-Manuel Miranda Turns to Rhyme in TV Plea for Puerto Rico

snippet: Mr. Miranda, whose parents are both from Puerto Rico, was on “Last Week Tonight With John Oliver” to seek relief.
abstract: Actor Lin-Manuel Miranda performs rap about Puerto Rico's financial crisis on HBO show Last Week Tonight With John Oliver.
